li.label: boring singing shanties
li.description: The cap'n displayed a lack of passion and the feeling of camaraderie just wasn't there.

li.label: lame singing shanties
li.description: The cap'n treated us like children, wanting so desperately to hear something to lift their spirits.

li.label: rousing singing shanties
li.description: Shiver me timbers, those were some good shanties! The cap'n lifted our spirits and made us feel a camaraderie and togetherness that will only make us stronger.

li.label: amazing singing shanties
li.description: We can still hear the mesmerizing words of the cap'n, as they reminded us of the importance of our shared camaraderie. We can even feel our sadness vanish away.
